name: The Tea Simulator
description:
Hello lovely People!

This (very short) Game Prototype has been created in about 3 Hours of coding after being challenged to build a game about Tea by someone on the TheGeekCupboard Discord Server.

In its current stage it is by far not done or polished, maybe Ill work on it some more, maybe i wont. This is just a small side-thingy after all.

I hope you have fun, please give some feedback on features, improvements, bugs and more for that would be splendid indeed.
